name: Bella Riva Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When you visit Lake Garda, the major objective remains as to enjoy the lake as much as possible, this hotel offers the most of it. Nice rooms. Quiet location. Rooms with great view and gives you the opportunity to enjoy typical verona flavor. The garden is really excellent. A great combination of flora and old trees really added another paradigm of beauty to the hotel. The rooms are really nice, clean and with great views to the lake. The food is excellent. The pool serves the temperature controlled water but you may choose to walk few minutes to enjoy the lake itself. The staffs are friendly and attentive. Great vacation can be enjoyed from here.
reviews.title: Paradise on the bank of the lake Garda

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bella Riva was exactly what I had dreamt an Italian Villa to be. The sophisticated ambience, the kind and professional service and the gorgeous room and amenities of this hotel make it well worth the price. The location on the lake is outstanding. The pool is a quiet haven and the food was delicious, served on a pretty terrace facing the lake and grounds. I had some difficulty negotiating the high tech lighting fixtures; all touch button controlled from a console beside the bed, including opening and closing the blinds. But staff made me feel that this was my own private villa and they were there just to make me happy. I will return to this hotel and recommend it as the most romantic place in the world!
reviews.title: A really beautiful dream

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms at the Bella Riva Hotel are stylish and modern with great bathrooms. The bar is really good, too. But the fact to recommend the hotel is definitely the location: the fantastic garden with old trees at the lake and the stylish pool. We could have spend days just relaxing there. Go there for a weekend or for a longer stay as from Gardone you can visit lake Garda, Brescia and Verona.
reviews.title: Heavenly location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The property is located right on the lake and so if you ensure a lake view room you will have a quiet location. The rooms not facing the lake would be impacted by road noise. The hotel has been renovated in a clean contemporary manner which is preferred by me. The bathroom was impecible but the room rath bland, no art. Common rooms are bright and airy and the breakfast buffet which was included was excellent with good choices and good service. There is a lovely garden area with pool and the restaurant outdoor seating is great.
reviews.title: Right on the lake

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were most accommodating. It is possible to walk into the nect village of Moderna where there are cafes and also a supermarket for water and snacks. We had a glass of wine in the hotel bar one evenng and thought that 20 euros was a little streep. We also felt the rate of 400 euros a night for small suite with a king bed was a little over the top.
reviews.title: Best all round hotel in Italy during a one month holiday.

reviews.text: Never been to Lake Garda so I wanted to play safe for the three days. Hotel was only opened in 2010 and looked very good with the site right on the Lake. Problem is that the architecture is too much out of a fashion magazine, feels sterile - as does the whole place which oozes pretentiousness - and attracts a matching clientele. Staff also moves around like ghosts from a horror movie, no gentilezza, no panache, their facial expressions match the horrible overlong black trousers. Worst of all, there is no real access to the lake as a pedestrian walkway runs all along the property and cuts it off from the Lake.
reviews.title: New but sterile

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for a couple of nights in July-The hotel is right on the lakefront with a lovely view.The hotel is of a high quality with the staff being very attentive.Most of the guests seemed to be Germans.The hotel room we had was perfect with a comfortable bed,fine bathroom,and alot of fancy electric switches to control the lights etc.Molton Brown shower gels etc are a nice touch.The breakfast was excellent with a wide choice,we didnt dine in the hotel as it was a bit pricey for us!The only slight problem with the hotel is that it is 30mins walk from Gardone centre-and the walk isnt along the lakeside (which would be lovely) but is along a rather busy road-this is a bit of a pain if you fancy a walk into town.Other than that i cant find fault with the hotel-greta pool,relaxed atmosphere and a bit of buzz in the bar at night.
reviews.title: Quality Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place has the perfect mix of traditional and contemporary style. Great rooms, bar, restaurant, service. Food and all amenities. excellent. Convenient for ferries. Short walk into Gardone.
reviews.title: Wonderfully stylish weekend break

reviews.text: Wonderfully designed room, great bathroom with my favorite Molton Brown toiletries.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great bar and terrace with awesome view on the lake, Andrea the GM was a perfect host
reviews.title: Great Hotel with wonderful view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is by for the most excellent I have stayed in at Lake Garda, is has a beautiful setting and our room # 202 was faboulous! Terrasse on the lake , no noise from the street.
reviews.title: Fantastic, excellent, the best on Garda!

reviews.text: Breakfast was so good! Especially for Italy! Even the pastry was freshly made and in the evening the restaurant was exquisite..big bravo for the chef! I will definitly come back to this hotel if I am in the near of Lake Garda!!
reviews.title: BElla Riva; The best place to be.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Recently I stayed with my family for 10 nights at the Bella Riva Hotel. I am confident that Bella Riva is the best place to stay at Lago di Garda;
reviews.title: Beautiful old style villa with top modern interieur
Absolutely fabulous!
reviews.text: * entire staff is very friendly, helpful, great knowledge of the arera, good suggestions, make you feel at home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * excellent food, especially the parma ham
reviews.title: Beautful Lakeside Setting
I don't give out "perfect" easily...but this hotel is.
reviews.text: Terrific hotel. I originally booked the balcony suite, and we were upgraded to the terrace suite.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If I had known what the terrace suite is like, I wouldn't have taken the chance, but booked it straight away.
reviews.title: perfect, perfect, perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's unbelievable. You have a private terrace overlooking the lake, and not one of those "2 chairs and an ashtray" size terraces - huge, easily 100 sf.
reviews.title: As good as it gets!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant is a steak-lovers paradise, but not bad for a non-carnivore too.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in beautiful building - I would highly recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is the reason we NEVER stay in large grand hotels if we can help it.
reviews.title: Beautiful boutique hotel by Lake Garda

aka: Bella Riva Hotel Lake Garda/Gardone Riviera, Italy
description: Bella riva is a comfortable hotel with a 5 star contemporary charm. An elegant architecture, beautiful suites, impeccable service, deluxe amenities, and, of course, our prime location on the lake await you so that your day flows pleasant and carefree. The historic building has been completely renovated in 2010
